description: The Public Works and Government Services on behalf of Fisheries and Oceans Canada, Correctional  Service of Canada and Department of National Defense is issuing this request for standing offer for the acquisition of Bakery products located in Quebec.

full_summary:
**RFP Notice**
================

### Tender Details

* **Title (English/French)**: E6MON-24PQBO - P01 - RMSO Bakery Products / E6MON-24PQBO - P01 - OCPR Produits de Boulangerie
* **Reference Number (English/French)**: WS4431900429 /  WS4431900429
* **Amendment Number (English/French)**: 2

### Tender Information

* **Solicitation Number (English/French)**: WS4431900429
* **Publication Date (English)**: February 19, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date (English)**: March 7, 2024 2:00 PM EST
* **Amendment Date (English)**: February 21, 2024
* **Expected Contract Start Date (English)**: TBA
* **Expected Contract End Date (English)**: March 31, 2025
* **Tender Status (English/French)**: Expired/Expiré
* **UNSPSC (English/French)**: 50180000/ 50180000
* **UNSPSC Description (English/French)**: Bread and bakery products/ Produits de boulangerie ou de biscuiterie

### Tender Details

* **Procurement Category (English)**: Goods and Services /Bien de consommation ou services
* **Notice Type (English/French)**: Request for Standing Offer / Demande d’offre à commandes
* **Procurement Method (English/French)**: Competitive open bidding / Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner
* **Selection Criteria (English/French)**: Lowest price / Prix le plus bas

### Trade Agreements

* **Canada WTO GPA / accord sur les marchés publics de l'OMC**

### Delivery Region

* **Quebec (excluding NCR)**

### Contact Information

* **Contact Name (English/French)**: Selina Ly, Sr. Procurement Officer (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Contact Email (English)**: [selina.ly@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:selina.ly@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Contact Link (English/French)**: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18835470?extsite=MTg4MzU0N
